src_original: eṣa dṛṣṭva janavyādhipīḍitān prāṇino dukhaśatairupadrutān /  janmamṛtyubhayaśokatāpinaḥ teṣu arthi carate kṛpāśayaḥ // 83 //
tgt_original: 『若見諸眾生，老病諸苦逼，及憂生死怖，發大悲利行。

src_original: duḥkhayantraparipīḍitaṃ jagad dṛṣṭva pañcagaticakramaṇḍale /  jñānavajramayameṣate dṛḍhaṃ duḥkhayantragaticakrabhedanam // 84 //
tgt_original: 由見世苦逼，五趣常流轉，為求堅利智，破諸趣苦輪。

src_original: rāgadoṣatṛṇathāṇukaṇṭakaṃ dṛṣṭisaṅgabahukaṃ kṣatāṅkuram /
tgt_original: 若見貪樂者，過患多榛棘，為作堅固犁，淨治眾生地。

src_original: mohavidyagahanāśayaṃ jagat prajñacakṣuhata naṣṭadaiśikam /
tgt_original: 癡壞世間明，及正道惠眼，為群盲導師，示其安隱處。

src_original: śūrabhūta abhayasya dāyako deśiko hi jagatāṃ bhaviṣyati // 87 //
tgt_original: 智劍伏冤賊，解脫三法忍，為世間導師，令得離憂怖。

src_original: dharmanāva samudānayatyayaṃ jñānasāgarapathe suśikṣitaḥ /  śāṇtiratnavaradvīpanāyakaḥ karṇadhāra tribhavārṇave ayam // 88 //
tgt_original: 或如法舡主，令涉智海道，為三有導師，達勝忍寶所。

src_original: jñānaraśmipraṇidhānamaṇḍalaḥ sarvasattvabhuvanāvabhāsanaḥ /  (Gv 382)  dharmadhātugagane mahāprabho buddhasūrya samudeṣyate ayam // 89 //
tgt_original: 智光大願輪，如佛日出現，光含法界空，普照群生暗。

src_original: maitracandanasamānaśītalaḥ sarvasattvasamacitta suprabhaḥ /  śukladharmaparipūrṇamaṇḍalo buddhacandra samudeṣyate ayam // 90 //
tgt_original: 白法圓滿輪，如佛月出現，慈定清涼光，平等照諸有。

src_original: āśaye dṛḍhatalapratiṣṭhito bodhicarya anupūrva udgataḥ /  sarvadharmaratanākaro hyayaṃ jñānasāgaravaro bhaviṣyati // 91 //
tgt_original: 又若勝智海，出生諸法寶，菩提行漸高，住深心堅固。

src_original: bodhicittabhujagendrasaṃbhavo dharmadhātugagane samudgataḥ /  dharmameghayugapatpravarṣaṇe sarvaśuklaphalasasyavardhanam // 92 //
tgt_original: 發心若龍主，昇法界虛空，雨甘露法雲，增諸白果苗。

src_original: śuddhavarti trimalaṃ tamoharaṃ maitrasnehasmṛtibhājanaṃ dṛḍham /  bodhicittavimalāgnisuprabhaṃ dharmadīpamayu jālayiṣyati // 93 //
tgt_original: 又若然法燈，正念堅固器，慈愛無垢光，淨除三毒暗。

src_original: bodhiaṅgaanupūrvasaṃbhavo buddhagarbhu ayu saṃpravardhate // 94 //
tgt_original: 又此菩提心，譬如羯邏羅，悲疱慈閉尸，鉢羅健南位。 菩提分漸生，令佛藏增長，福德藏亦然，得智藏清淨。

src_original: īdṛśaḥ karuṇamaitravarmitaḥ sattvamocanamatī hitāśayaḥ /
tgt_original: 又開發惠藏，如願藏出生，此慈悲法性，解脫眾生故。

src_original: durlabho jagi sadevamānuṣe yādṛśo ayu viśuddhamānasaḥ // 96 //  (Gv 383)  īdṛśāśayasumūlasaṃsthito īdṛśo dṛḍhaprayogavardhitaḥ /  īdṛśastribhavachādanaprabho jñānavṛkṣa phaladaḥ sudurlabhaḥ // 96 //
tgt_original: 世間天人中，淨意難可得，希有智果樹，植妙深固本。 眾行漸增榮，普覆於三有，欲長諸功德，請問一切法。

src_original: eṣā guṇasaṃbhavanārthikaḥ sarvadharmaparipṛcchanārthikaḥ /  sarvasaṃśayavidāraṇārthikaḥ sarva mitra bhajate atandritaḥ // 97 //
tgt_original: 斷除一切疑，求諸善知識，欲壞煩惱魔，淨除塵染見。

src_original: cittanagarālaṃkāraprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ daśatathāgatabalādhyānalambanatayā /
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 應守護心城，謂樂排遣一切生死輪迴境界。 應莊嚴心城，謂專趣求如來十力。

src_original: cittanagarapariśodhanaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyamīrṣyāmātsaryaśāṭhyāpanayanatayā /  cittanagarasaṃtāpapraśamābhiyuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ sarvadharmanidhyaptyā /
tgt_original: 應淨治心城，謂畢竟斷除慳嫉諂誑。

src_original: cittanagaravivardhanābhiyuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ sarvajñatāsaṃbhāramahāvīryavegavivardhanatayā /
tgt_original: 應增長心城，謂增長大精進行求一切智。

src_original: cittanagarabhavanakośavyūhārakṣāprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ sarvasamādhisamāpattidhyānavimokṣavipuladharmavinayamānavihāravaśavartitayā  cittanagarāvabhāsaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalasamudayasamantabhūmiprajñāpāramitāpratilambhapratīcchanatayā  cittanagaropastambhaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ sarvatathāgatasaṃbhavopāyamārgasvacittanagarasamavasaraṇatayā /  cittanagaradṛḍhaprākārābhinirhāraprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ samantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānābhinirhāracittaviśuddhaye /  cittanagaraduryodhanadurāsadatābhinirhāraprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ sarvakleśamārakāyikapāpamitramāracakrānavamṛdyatayā /  cittanagarāvabhāsanaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ sarvasattvatathāgatajñānāvabhāsapratipadyamānatayā /  cittanagarābhiniṣyandanaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ sarvatathāgatadharmameghasaṃpratīcchanatayā /  cittanagaropastambhanaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ sarvatathāgatapuṇyasamudrasvacittāśayasaṃpratīcchanatayā /
tgt_original: 應防護心城，謂摧碎魔輪禦捍一切煩惱魔眾及惡知識。

src_original: cittanagarapravistaraṇaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ mahāmaitrīsarvajagatpharaṇatayā /
tgt_original: 應廣大心城，謂以大慈普及一切世間。

src_original: cittanagarasaṃpraticchādanaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ vipuladharmacchatrasarvākuśaladharmapratipakṣābhinirharaṇatayā /
tgt_original: 應覆蔭心城，謂以廣大法蓋對治諸不善法。

src_original: (Gv 340) cittanagarapratisyandanaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ vipulamahākaruṇāsarvajagadanukampanatayā /  cittanagaradvāravivaraṇaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyamādhyātmikavāhyavastusarvajagatsaṃprāpaṇatayā /  cittanagaraviśodhanaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ sarvasaṃsāraviṣayaratiparāṅbhukhatayā /

src_original: cittanagaradṛḍhasthāmābhinirhāraprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ sarvākuśaladharmasvasaṃtatyasaṃbhavanatayā /  cittanagaravīryaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ sarvajñatāsaṃbhārasamārjanavīryābhinirvartanatayā  / cittanagaraprabhāsanaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ sarvatryadhvatathāgatamaṇḍalasmṛtyavabhāsanatayā /
tgt_original: 應嚴肅心城，謂欲排遣諸不善法。

src_original: arthāya sarvasattvānāmutpadyante tathāgatāḥ /  mahākāruṇikā dhīrā dharmacakrapravartakāḥ // 92 //
tgt_original: 「如來大慈悲，　　出現於世間， 普為諸群生，　　轉無上法輪。

src_original: pratikartuṃ kathaṃ śakyaṃ buddhānāṃ sarvadehibhiḥ /  sattvārtheṣvabhiyuktānāṃ kalpakoṭiśatairapi // 93 //

src_original: kalpakoṭyo varaṃ pakvastryapāye bhṛśadāruṇe /

src_original: sarvasattvagatau yāvān duḥkhaskandhaḥ pravartate /  utsoḍhavyaḥ sa nikhilo buddhānāṃ na tvadarśanam // 95 //  yāvantyaḥ sarvaloke 'sminnapāyagatayaḥ pṛthak /  varaṃ tatra ciraṃ vāso buddhānāmaśrutirna ca // 96 //  ekaikatra varaṃ kalpān nivāso narake 'pi tān /
tgt_original: 寧在諸惡趣，　　常得聞佛名，

src_original: kiṃ kāraṇamapāyeṣu nivāsaściramiṣyate /
tgt_original: 何故願久住，　　一切惡道中？
